segments.text: What did you say when she told you the news ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I calmed up . And finally , I asked her to chew the cud for such an important decision . I could not have the heart to disappoint her with a blunt refusal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I put my foot down and insisted on her forgetting that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How could have the heart to do that ? She needs warmth and help .
segments.speaker: S2
